text: Akho, akasam ate dharati da raba kauna hai. Kahi di'o, alaha. Akho, ki phira vi tusim usa tom' binham ajihe madadagara bana rakhe hana jihare khuda apane labha ate hani la'i vi samaratha nahim rakhade. Akhom, ki anha ate sujakha dovem barabara ho sakade hana jam hanhera ate prakasa dovem ika samana ho janage ki unham ne alaha de ajihe sarika mane hana jinham ne alaha vanga kujha paida kita hove ate ki isa srisati di honda te inham nu sadeha hai?. Akho, alaha hi hara ziza nu paida karana vala hai, ate uha ikala hi sarava sakatimana hai
